name: sauerbraten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a German dish made by covering beef (= meat from a cow) in a mixture of vinegar, spices, and vegetables for a long time, and then slowly cooking it in a liquid: My German grandmother often cooked sauerbraten for us. This inn serves the best sauerbraten in town.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are many variations of sauerbraten, each coming from a different region of Germany.We had a three-course meal of vegetable soup, sauerbraten, and fresh fruit.The sauerbraten was served with noodles and homemade apple sauce.
